Transform k-mer enrichments to motif enrichments.

convertKmersToMotifs.Rd

Using a set of know motifs and the result of a k-mer enrichment analysis (k-mers by bins), transform the results into motif enrichments (motifs by bins).

convertKmersToMotifs(x, m, BPPARAM = SerialParam(), verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

x

A SummarizedExperiment with the results of a k-mer enrichment analysis (typically generated by calcBinnedKmerEnr).
m

Either a PFMatrixList, or a character scalar with a file containing motifs in HOMER format (loaded into a PFMatrixList by homerToPFMatrixList).
BPPARAM

An optional BiocParallelParam instance determining the parallel back-end to be used during evaluation.
verbose

A logical scalar. If TRUE, report on progress.

See also

calcBinnedKmerEnr for performing a k-mer enrichment analysis, bplapply used for parallelization.
